concept.title: Start Eucalyptus
concept.shortdesc: Start the Eucalyptus components in the order presented in this section.

conbody.p: Make sure that each host you installed a Eucalyptus component on resolves to an IP address. Edit the /etc/hosts file if necessary.
conbody.note: Eucalyptus requires version 7 of the Java Virtual Machine. Make sure that your CLOUD_OPTS settings in the /etc/eucalyptus/eucalyptus.conf file either do not set --java-home, or that --java-home points to a version 7 JVM. This needs to happen before services are started but after the upgraded packages are installed.
